Description: Blue glazed composition shabti of the lady of the house Bakti with black painted detail: a striated lappet-wig, a modelled face with traced features, a collar and crossed hands in high relief with bracelets holding two hoes; the leg section is inscribed with part of Chapter 6 of the Book of The Dead in eight rows of black painted Hieroglyphs; the back is decorated with a representation of a low-slung yoke with two pendular seed-bags.
Acquisition name: Purchased from: R J Moss & Co
